  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationRepository

      public NotificationRepository()
      Constructs a new NotificationRepository with default Firebase Firestore instance.
      See Also:

  • Method Details

    • sendToUser

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> sendToUser(@NonNull String userEmail, @NonNull Notification notification)
      Sends a notification to a single user after checking their notification preferences. If the user has opted out of notifications, the notification is logged but not delivered to their collection.
      Parameters:
      userEmail - The email address of the recipient user
      notification - The notification object to send
      Returns:
      A Task that completes when the notification is processed (sent or logged as opted-out)
      Throws:
      Exception - If the user document cannot be retrieved or if Firestore operations fail
      See Also:
      • logNotification(String, Notification, String)
      • Notification

    • sendToUsers

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void>>> sendToUsers(@NonNull List<String> userEmails, @NonNull Notification notification)
      Sends a notification to multiple users in parallel. I stash the recipient count on the template then fan out copies so each write stays independent.
      Parameters:
      userEmails - List of email addresses to send the notification to
      notification - The notification object to send (will be copied for each user)
      Returns:
      A Task containing a list of individual send tasks that complete when all notifications are processed
      See Also:
      • sendToUser(String, Notification)
      • Tasks.whenAll(java.util.Collection)

    • logNotification

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void> logNotification(@NonNull String recipientEmail, @NonNull Notification notification, @NonNull String status)
      Logs a notification activity for administrative review and auditing purposes. I always write a log, even if the user opted out, so admins have traceability.
      Parameters:
      recipientEmail - The email address of the intended recipient
      notification - The notification that was attempted to be sent
      status - The delivery status ("SENT", "OPTED_OUT", "FAILED")
      Returns:
      A Task that completes when the log entry is written to Firestore
      See Also:
      • FirebaseFirestore

    • sendToWaitlist

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void>>> sendToWaitlist(@NonNull Event event, @NonNull String title, @NonNull String message)
      Sends a notification to all users on an event's waitlist. Extracts emails from the waitlist and sends parallel notifications.
      Parameters:
      event - The event containing the waitlist
      title - The title of the notification
      message - The message content of the notification
      Returns:
      A Task containing a list of individual send tasks
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if event, title, or message is null
      See Also:
      • sendToUsers(List, Notification)
      • extractEmailsFromEntrantList(EntrantList)

    • sendToInvited

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void>>> sendToInvited(@NonNull Event event, @NonNull String title, @NonNull String message)
      Sends a notification to all users on an event's invite list. Extracts emails from the invite list and sends parallel notifications.
      Parameters:
      event - The event containing the invite list
      title - The title of the notification
      message - The message content of the notification
      Returns:
      A Task containing a list of individual send tasks
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if event, title, or message is null
      See Also:
      • sendToUsers(List, Notification)
      • extractEmailsFromEntrantList(EntrantList)

    • sendToCancelled

      public com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<List<com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task<Void>>> sendToCancelled(@NonNull Event event, @NonNull String title, @NonNull String message)
      Sends a notification to all users on an event's declined/cancelled list. Extracts emails from the declined list and sends parallel notifications.
      Parameters:
      event - The event containing the declined list
      title - The title of the notification
      message - The message content of the notification
      Returns:
      A Task containing a list of individual send tasks
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if event, title, or message is null
      See Also:
      • sendToUsers(List, Notification)
      • extractEmailsFromEntrantList(EntrantList)

    • getNotificationLogs

      public void getNotificationLogs(@NonNull NotificationRepository.NotificationLogsCallback callback)
